Class AssistantCardController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.AssistantCardController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIController
public class AssistantCardController extends Object implements GUIController
The controller related to choose-assistant view

    • setAssistantButton

      public void setAssistantButton(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane anchorPane, AssistantCard ac)
      this method sets the anchorPaneButton of a specific gridPane
      Parameters:
      anchorPane - inside the cell of the grid, where the anchorPaneButton will be placed
      ac - that will be shown in the grid

    • setAssistantImage

      public void setAssistantImage(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane anchorPane, AssistantCard ac)
      this method sets the image of an Assistant of a specific gridPane
      Parameters:
      anchorPane - inside the cell of the grid, where the image will be placed
      ac - assistant that will be shown in the image

    • clearAllGrids

      public void clearAllGrids()
      This method clears all the grids. Il will be called before setting new content in the cells of the grid so that there are no duplicates

    • forceClose

      public void forceClose()
      This method closes the window and prevents its reopening.
